TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IThemeResolutionService

Docs.summary: Provides an interface that designer tool developers can use to supply a set of objects, which can be used to apply themes and control skins to controls in a design-time environment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Page developers and control authors do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface. The <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface is implemented by designer tool developers to supply <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> control builders in the design environment.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> is a container for one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> objects, which in turn supply the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> objects that apply themes and control skins to controls when they are created in a designer. An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> class can be accessed from a given <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> instance using its <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.ThemeResolutionService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
